features: 🔪MIDONE 17 PIECE KNIFE SET - 17-piece professional set includes 8” Carving knife, 8” Bread knife, 8" Chef knife,5.5" Santoku knife, 5" Utility knife, 4.5"Steak knives(x6), 4.5" Cheese knife,4.5"Pizze knife,3.5"Paring knife, Shears, Knife wooden block.

🔪PROFESSIONAL QUALITY STAINLESS STEEL - Knives are forgedorged with german high carbon stainless steel manually polished to keep the sharp edge, no rust, no pits. Sharper cutting face with more acute 16-degree angles. Cuts iron like mud!
🔪MODERN STYLING WOONDEM BLOCK - Modern, stylish woonden block design with stainless steel accents fits conveniently on your countertop and complements any kitchen decor.
🔪EXCLUSIVE BUILT-IN SHARPENER - This kitchen knives set comes with a built-in sharpener which is a handy bonus. Saves you the hassle of sharpening blades on a sharpening steel.

🔪MIDONE PROMISE - We are fully committed to providing users with quality products and services. Our customer support team will respond within 24-48 Hours! 100% satisfactory resolution in case of any issues. We promise you a replacement or refund.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MIDONE Premium17-Piece Knife Set Meet the easy solution to the home-sharpeningproblem. MIDONE Premium 17-Piece Knife Set are forged from German stainless steel, making them extremely durable.Built-in sharpener technology makes it easy to maintainsuperior sharpness by just swiping the lever.
Previous page Next page 1 8" Cavring Knife 2 8"Checf Knife 3 5.5' Santoku Knife
Previous page Next page 1 6 Pcs Steak Knives 2 Utility & Paring Knife 3 Cheese & Pizza Knife

Versatility Made Easy With our 14-piece set, you can unlock new recipes and cutting techniques with a razorsharp knife that helps you get the most out of youringredients, whether you're dicing, mincing, or slicing

CONTENTS AND STORAGE 8'' Carving Knife A carving knife is used almost exclusively for slicing meat,It shouldn't be used to hack through bone or other hard materials, as these may damage the blade 5.5'' Santoku Knife Santokus are most often used for chopping, dicing, and mincing. Because of their precision edge, they're especially useful for julienning thin slices of vegetables and meats. 8'' Chef Knife Designed to perform a variety of kitchen tasks, from slicing, chopping and mincing vegetables, fruits and herbs, to cutting through large slabs of meat and disjointing bones. 8'' Bread Knife The primary job of a bread knife is to slice bread. A good bread knife should saw through a tough crust without mangling or compressing the tender crumb within. 5'' Utility Knife Cutting cordage, cutting/scraping hides, butchering animals, cleaning fish scales, reshaping timber, and other tasks. 3.5'' Paring Knife Peeling apples and potatoes, mincing small amounts of garlic and onions, and coring tomatoes. 3.5'' Pizza Knife Used to cut various items into sections or slices. 4.5''Cheese Knife The blade is flat and short so you can apply force straight down on a small area and cut small pieces without crushing surrounding cheeseboard accompaniments 4.5'' Steak Knife (6 Pcs) Used to cut steaks and other firm meats. It has a serrated edge and plastic handle scales. Steak knives are characterized by their serrated edge. 5'' Scissors Scissors are used for cutting various thin materials, such as paper, cardboard, metal foil, cloth, rope, and wire. Built-in Sharpener It's good practice to hone a knife often to maintain the edge and only sharpen it when it becomes dull. Wooden Block Made of New Zealand wood, professional spray painting process, and metal nameplate, classic and beautiful knife set perfect for Thanksgiving and Christmas gifts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The whole thing looks very sheik. All of the knives are very shark but I also love the built in sharpener

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Loved the color and amount of knives

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Oh golly amazing for amazing price
reviews.reviewText: These are gorgeous and soooo sharp!! Like be careful! Also don't use a hard scrubber or lemon soap l. Not sure why but not gonna risk it. My husband absolutely geeked over these and even giggled at the pizza and cheese knife!! Worth the buy 100%

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent knife set for the money
reviews.reviewText: This is a pretty good knife set, especially for fifty bucks. The knives were all very sharp and there is a good selection of them. The block is very nice--it is solid feeling, stores all the knives, and has a built in sharpener. I am not very impressed with the cheese and pizza knives--they don't cut very well and I think the seller would be better off just providing two more utility or paring knives. The knife handles also do not feel very solid and I am afraid that they are the things that are inevitably going to break or fail on these knives. However, you can probably get a couple of years of regular use out of this set before it falls apart which is pretty good for the low price. If you want something of higher quality that is going to last longer, you are going to have to pay two or three more times the cost of this set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really like this knife set better than any other knife blocks that I’ve seen. The black of the block and the black of the knives themselves looks very sleek.The knives are already very sharp, but the block does come with a built-in knife sharpener for convenience.The cheese cutter and pizza cutter are my favorite knives in the whole block and I am very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this set
reviews.reviewText: This was such an awesome knife set. My favorite was the cheese and pizza knives. They look so cool. I love that the set is black and came with so many different Knives.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Looks great and work perfectly. Comes with about every knife you will need. Built in sharpener. Blades cut excellent straight out of the box. Directions say avoid dishwasher but that’s standard for kitchen knives. Block is heavy knives seat fairly well. What you get for the MSRP is fairly reasonable.
